title: What can I do if my mobile data connection constantly disconnects?
answer:
l   Take your phone to a place with good reception.

l   Go to the **Settings** screen, touch **More** > **Mobile networks**, and select the **Enable always-on mobile data** check box.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204203334212001.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204203335152002.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204203335855003.jpg)

l   Contact your service provider to make sure your APN parameters are properly configured. Go to the **Settings** screen, touch **More** > **Mobile networks**, and touch **Access Point Names** to view your APN information.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204203334212001.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204203335152002.jpg)![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204203336584004.jpg)

If the problem persists, back up important data, restore your phone to its factory settings, and try again.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20141204203336704005.png)

The figures are for your reference only. The actual screens may vary.
